title: In Galle A Golden Opportunity Buy A Property
location: Dickson junction, Baddegama Road, Galle, Galle
details:
Faced to a main road. High valuable land and house. Leading schools boundaries. 2 km to Galle town. 2 km to Karapitiya hospital. 4 km to Southern highway entrance at Dewata. A well built house for more than 100 years guaranteed. All super markets, pharmacies and good transportation.
Ideal for a villa or any kind of commercial purposes.

NB:
House inspection only prior appointment with our real estate agent. No direction and NO BROKERS PLEASE.
